title: Viktor needs a new skin
body:
{{champion:112}} It has been over a year and Viktor hasn't had a new skin. Please stop giving Ahri all these new skins when champions like Viktor need some love.
;-; makes me cry.

replies.body: But vik doesn't have 2 big selling points like ahri does.
Tits and ass? kappa

I've got like tons of ideas. Maybe at least one of them might be useful

 Arcade Vik
[http://imgur.com/a/BR8lz](http://imgur.com/a/BR8lz)

Disco Vik
[http://imgur.com/a/Wh9HG](http://imgur.com/a/Wh9HG)

Surgeon
[http://imgur.com/a/rYc6E](http://imgur.com/a/rYc6E)

And last but not least, that one which I can't name properly. Ended up as Aristocrat.
[http://img05.deviantart.net/8c65/i/2016/014/9/2/aristocrat_viktor_skin_concept_by_ikleyvey-d9ny0qy.png](http://img05.deviantart.net/8c65/i/2016/014/9/2/aristocrat_viktor_skin_concept_by_ikleyvey-d9ny0qy.png)

But most importantly, I'd want him to get a fun and "good guy" skin. All of his current ones are either serious or grim. Some variety can't hurt.
You do realize that {{champion:28}}  got her last skin in 2014 and none of them actually look good or have particle effects at least {{champion:112}} has one good looking one...
Creator Viktor was released in 2013.

I actually dislike Creator Viktor.
I might own all his skins but still usually stick with Full metal or Prototype.

He really needs a new one with a different color scheme.
Skins for Eve are on ice until after the VGU

>It has been over a year and Viktor hasn't had a new skin. 

wat?  it was 3 years since his last skin. keep up :0
Arcade Viktor would've been so much better than Arcade Ahri.
YA DAMN RIGHT IT WOULDA BEEN

I actually have been rooting as Viktor as the next possible ultimate skin winner. He's so easy to work with. I'm imagining a neon 90's warrior kinda thing, either that, or a Saturday cartoon villain esc theme. Dude only has 3 skins, and one of them's legacy. He needs it.
http://imgur.com/a/wiX4S

Psh, who needs a new skin when you got the classic?

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Viktor_0.jpg

Pure. Awesomeness.

Though another skin wouldn't hurt. Maybe a more lighthearted one like many people suggested below. Cuz good luck out-cooling the classic.
Meanwhile Swain lol. Some champions need skins more than Viktor.
At this rate, he'll be getting a Viktorious skin eventually.

> [{quoted}](name=Teklm,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TFjxQkVR,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-21T14:37:01.781+0000)
>
> At this rate, he'll be getting a Viktorious skin eventually.

Azir will get Viktorious skin.
plz we all kno URGOT will get it.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TFjxQkVR,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-08-21T17:17:01.757+0000)
>
> plz we all kno URGOT will get it.

No.Aatrox.

{{champion:83}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:143}} 
Etc...

> [{quoted}](name=invisiblecat1,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TFjxQkVR,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-08-21T15:25:17.762+0000)
>
> {{champion:83}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:143}} 
> Etc...

no skin for {{champion:83}} until his rework happens, which is soon btw
Next week possibly :D
Viktor should be getting the new Victorious skin. So unless you aren't gold, be prepared for a new vik skin
{{champion:83}} , been almost 5 years, still not another one.

> [{quoted}](name=skaarj888,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TFjxQkVR,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2016-08-22T01:19:57.273+0000)
>
> {{champion:83}} , been almost 5 years, still not another one.

again, they won't make a skin for {{champion:83}} until hes been reworked, no point creating a skin and then reworking it as he gets updated, would be a waste of time. But yes he does need a new skin as soon as he gets reworked.
I was always thinking of Definitely Not Viktor. He'd be an old man wearing antique clothing. His staff would be a cane, and his third-arm thingy majingy a big feather kind of thing...
Viktorious skin This season?
Azir's p/b rate is higher than Viktor.Azir will get Viktorious skin.Stay salty and downvote me.Facts hurt.
Oh damn, how can someone live after hearing those hard facts? There is no way League is living in the video game genre after this.
Azir has had 2 recent skins, if he gets another one before Viktor this quick I will cry.
